title: Sponsors — National Ayurvedic Medical Association
description: Sponsors and Partners Become a Sponsor or a Partner Contact Us!
cleaned_text: 2023 Annual Sponsors Thank You, Sponsors! Our Sponsors are so important! We are able to accomplish many of our goals with their support. Get to know them better by enjoying their presentations below. Platinum [Kottakkal USA](https://www.kottakkal.shop) is the only authorized distributor of Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala products in the US. Our mission is to offer classical Ayurvedic products that are safe and effective, as well as educational materials, consultations and fruits and vegetables direct from our farms to enhance overall health. [Oneworld Ayurveda](https://www.oneworldayurveda.com) | Platinum Sponsor Bali - [Oneworld Ayurveda](https://www.oneworldayurveda.com) - is a leader in practicing and preserving the authenticity of the science of Ayurveda in South East Asia. A team of over 90 staff including three Ayurvedic doctors (BAMS) offers genuine Panchakarma lasting from 7 to 28 days. [Kerala Ayurveda](https://www.keralaayurveda.us) | Platinum Sponsor [Kerala Ayurveda](https://www.keralaayurveda.us) offers a full spectrum of Ayurvedic education, services and products in Milpitas, CA: consultations & Panchakarma, state-approved certifications, PACE-approved continued education, clinical internships and retreats in India. The product range includes high quality Ayurvedic oils, formulations, ghrithams, aristhams, supplements, organic foods, lifestyle and beauty. Gold [Banyan Botanicals](https://www.banyanbotanicals.com), a certified B Corp, is dedicated to serving Ayurvedic professionals with the highest quality Ayurvedic products using certified organic herbs that are sustainably sourced and fairly traded. They are committed to superior quality control and safety testing for heavy metals and more. The [Ayurvedic Institute](https://www.ayurveda.com) is the premiere school of Ayurveda in the West and world. Our in-depth, immersive programs are fit for anyone looking to deepen their own understanding of Ayurveda, learn more about themselves, or starting their career in the alternative healing space. [Garry N Sun USA ](https://garrysun.com)| Gold Sponsor [Garry N Sun USA](https://garrysun.com) has been in the business of Ayurveda for over two decades. Through the years, we have worked rigorously to ensure the best practices of quality control for our products, the services we provide our customers, and the practitioners we work with. At Garry N Sun, quality and prana matter. Silver [Pure Indian Foods](https://www.pureindianfoods.com) Founded in 2008 by the husband and wife team, [Pure Indian Foods](https://www.pureindianfoods.com) is an artisanal maker of grass-fed organic ghee products (including Ghritams), and offers complete line of sustainably-sourced, Non-GMO organic Indian groceries. [Mount Madonna Institute](https://www.mountmadonnainstitute.org/college-of-ayurveda/) | Silver Sponsor [Mount Madonna Institute](https://www.mountmadonnainstitute.org) trains professionals for careers in the Integrative Health fields through traditional and comprehensive academic and clinical curricula, with world renowned Master Teachers. AHC, C-AP, AYT, MA-Ay (meets NAMA AD course competencies).
